<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<text>
<sentence id="2002" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition, lemma" language="en">
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP" lemma="it">It</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ" lemma="be">'s</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="ADVP">
		<word type="RB" lemma="not">not</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="NN" lemma="music">music</word>
		<word type="PRP" lemma="you">you</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="MD" lemma="would">would</word>
		<word type="VB" lemma="use">use</word>
		<word type="TO" lemma="to">to</word>
		<word type="VB" lemma="get">get</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT" lemma="a">a</word>
		<word type="NN" lemma="girl">girl</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN" lemma="into">into</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN" lemma="bed">bed</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="." lemma=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
<sentence id="2003" token="word, part-of-speech, chunk, preposition, lemma" language="en">
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN" lemma="if">If</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="NN" lemma="anything">anything</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="," lemma=",">,</word>
	</chink>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP" lemma="you">you</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBP" lemma="be">'re</word>
		<word type="VBG" lemma="go">going</word>
		<word type="TO" lemma="to">to</word>
		<word type="VB" lemma="frighten">frighten</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="PRP" lemma="her">her</word>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type="RP" lemma="off">off</word>
	</chink>
	<chink>
		<word type="." lemma=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
